means: （电台的）时事评论员，实况广播报导员
主持[解释]宗教仪式的非教士

sentence.Network_en: A. M. Babu is a commentator on African affairs. A. M.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴布是一位非洲事务评论员。

sentence.Network_en: They're so lacking in confidence in the attraction of the games they televise that they feel they have to hype up with some hysterical commentator in order to get anyone to watch them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对于用电视播映比赛的吸引力太缺乏信心,以至于他们感到必须要用一个说得天花乱坠的讲解员来做实况广播,以便招揽观众.

sentence.Network_en: Virtually every serious commentator agrees that major reform within Third World education is long overdue.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上,任何认真的评论家都认为第三世界的教育早就应该实行重大的改革了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin, from commentari, frequentative of comminisci 'devise'

entry.def: A commentator is a broadcaster who gives a radio or television commentary on an event.
A commentator is someone who often writes or broadcasts about a particular subject.

example.ex: A. M. Babu is a commentator on African affairs.
example.tran: A. M. 巴布是一位非洲事务评论员。

means.word_mean: 1. an expert who observes and comments on something
2. a writer who reports and analyzes events of the day

auth_sentence.content: Celebrities at ringside included Diana Ross, Dustin Hoffman and Burt Lancaster, who served as color commentator.
auth_sentence.res_content: Celebrities at ringside included Diana Ross, Dustin Hoffman and Burt Lancaster, who served as color commentator.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Celebrities at ringside included Diana Ross, Dustin Hoffman and Burt Lancaster, who served as color commentator.

auth_sentence.content: The commentator was going mad, but all Donal could see was the door of the church.
auth_sentence.res_content: The commentator was going mad, but all Donal could see was the door of the church.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The commentator was going mad, but all Donal could see was the door of the church.

auth_sentence.content: Commentator Betty Baye has witnessed Ali go from a brash, self-assured fighter to a globally recognized messenger of peace.
auth_sentence.res_content: Commentator Betty Baye has witnessed Ali go from a brash, self-assured fighter to a globally recognized messenger of peace.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Commentator Betty Baye has witnessed Ali go from a brash, self-assured fighter to a globally recognized messenger of peace.

means.word_mean: 评论员,时事评论员;注释者;实况广播员

sentences.en: Political commentators are predicting that the minister will have to resign.
sentences.cn: 政治评论员预言这位部长将会辞职。

sentences.en: Several news commentators hit out at the president on his foreign policy.
sentences.cn: 有几位时事评论员猛烈抨击总统的对外政策。

sentences.en: Television sports commentators repeat the same phrases ad nauseam.
sentences.cn: 电视体育解说员说来说去就是那么几句话,令人厌烦。
